page.title: 12The Heron Riding Stables
page.content: I am mad keen on horses and spend every spare moment at the{riding {stables.}There are 12 horses to look after.Mine is an Appalusian, a white horse with brown spots called Polo. The{Pony Club}has 3 sections depending on your experience.I have one riding lesson a week.We go to a lot of{horse shows}and{gymkhanas}in the summer.I like the jumping and the egg and spoon races best.A travelling {blacksmith}from Yeovil comes regularly to shoe the horses. I often help to{muck out.}I put the horse to graze in the field and then clean out its box with a spade.When I have checked that there is plenty of water and hay in the box,I bring the horse back.Sometimes I muck out 5 boxes in one session.It is hard work but I love it.My friends complain that I am always out when they call to play
